item.title: 如果美国失去 AAA 评级，香港养老金计划减持国债
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港的养老基金经理已经制定了一项初步计划，如果美国失去其最后一个公认的最高信用评级，他们将在最快三个月内抛售所持有的国债。【原文：Hong Kong’s pension fund managers have formed a preliminary plan to sell down their Treasury holdings within as soon as three months if the US loses its last recognized top credit rating, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国法律纠纷缠身，阿达尼拜访中国设备制造商
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）上周前往中国会见工业设备制造商，这似乎是他自 11 月美国公布针对他的刑事和民事案件以来的首次海外之行。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani traveled to China last week to meet industrial equipment manufacturers, marking what appears to be his first overseas trip since the US unveiled criminal and civil cases against him in November.】

item.title: 墨西哥承诺为被驱逐者提供工作岗位，但因美国航班问题受阻
item.description: 墨西哥政府承诺为被美国驱逐出境的公民提供工作，但最近的数据显示，自 1 月下旬以来被驱逐出境的数万人中，只有 4% 的人找到了工作。【原文：Mexico’s government has pledged to provide jobs for citizens deported from the US, but recent data shows that barely 4% of the tens of thousands expelled since late January have been matched with employment.】

item.title: 土耳其央行寻求击退短期套利交易押注
item.description: 土耳其决策者正在采取措施阻止所谓的 "热钱 "流入里拉，以回击世界上最有利可图的货币赌注之一。【原文：Turkish policymakers are taking steps to deter so-called “hot money” flows into the lira, pushing back against one of the world’s most lucrative currency bets.】

item.title: 印度存管机构 NSDL 据称计划于 7 月首次公开募股 4 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，国家证券存管有限公司正在加紧实施首次公开募股计划，预计将筹集约 4 亿美元。【原文：National Securities Depository Ltd. is pressing ahead with its plan for an initial public offering that is expected to raise about $400 million, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚货币从全球最弱货币摇身一变成为涨幅最大货币
item.description: 坦桑尼亚先令的涨幅是 1 月中旬以来最大的，使非洲增长最快的经济体之一的货币跃升为今年迄今为止涨幅最大的货币。【原文：Tanzania’s shilling strengthened the most since mid January, catapulting the currency of one of Africa’s fastest-growing economies to the ranks of top gainers year-to-date.】

item.title: 加拿大前部长敦促加强对华关系以规避美国风险
item.description: 加拿大一位前高级官员表示，加拿大应加强与中国的关系，以规避美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对双边关系采取的不确定性。【原文：Canada should bolster ties with China to hedge against uncertainty from US President Donald Trump’s approach to bilateral relations, according to a former top Canadian official.】

item.title: 欧洲央行工资跟踪报告预示今年薪酬增长将大幅下滑
item.description: 根据欧洲中央银行对未来工资增长的主要衡量标准，欧元区的工资增长将在 2025 年急剧放缓，这增强了通货膨胀受到控制的论点。【原文：Wage growth in the euro zone will slow sharply in 2025, according to the European Central Bank’s main gauge of future pay increases – bolstering arguments that inflation is under control.】

item.title: 欧洲电力因法国反应堆腐蚀的新担忧而飙升
item.description: 由于核电巨头法国电力公司（Electricite de France SA）报告称一个反应堆出现了 "应力腐蚀 "迹象，再次引发了人们对可能再次削减发电量的担忧，因此欧洲各地的电价大幅上涨。【原文：Power prices across Europe jumped as nuclear giant Electricite de France SA reported signs of “stress corrosion” at a reactor, renewing fears that generation may be curtailed once again.】

item.title: 摩洛哥皇家航空公司将订购波音和空客大飞机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩洛哥皇家航空公司向波音公司订购一架大型飞机和向空中客车公司订购一架小型喷气式飞机的交易已进入最后阶段，这是这家北非航空公司扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Royal Air Maroc is in the final stages of a major order from Boeing Co. and a smaller deal for Airbus SE jets as part of the North African carrier’s expansion plans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲央行卡扎克斯称 "很有可能 "进行一些微调降息
item.description: 据 Econostream Media 报道，欧洲央行管理委员会成员马丁斯-卡扎克表示，可能需要进一步降息。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martins Kazaks said further interest-rate cuts may be needed, according to Econostream Media.】

item.title: Polygon 联合创始人 Sandeep Nailwal 接任基金会首席执行官一职
item.description: Polygon 的联合创始人 Sandeep Nailwal 被任命为该区块链项目基金会的首席执行官，以帮助其突出战略重点。【原文：Sandeep Nailwal, a co-founder of Polygon, has been appointed CEO of the blockchain project’s foundation to help sharpen its strategic focus.】

item.title: 欧元需求稳定显示对抗美元的挑战
item.description: 2024 年，欧元的国际使用量再次持平，这暴露了欧元在全球舞台上挑战美元的艰巨任务。【原文：International use of the euro remained flat for another year in 2024, laying bare the depth of the task in challenging the US dollar on the global stage.】

item.title: 据说瑞穗即将收购印度投资银行 Avendus
item.description: 瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc）即将收购投资银行 Avendus Capital Pvt 的多数股权，熟悉此事的人士称，这将是日本银行在印度的最新一次收购。【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. is on the verge of buying a majority stake in investment bank Avendus Capital Pvt, people familiar with the matter said, in what would be the latest acquisition by a Japanese bank in India.】

item.title: DayOne 为柔佛数据中心获得 35 亿美元融资
item.description: 根据华侨银行有限公司（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation Ltd.）的声明，DayOne Data Centers Singapore Pte. 获得了 150 亿林吉特（35 亿美元）的多币种融资，以支持其在马来西亚柔佛州的绿色数据中心。【原文：DayOne Data Centers Singapore Pte. secured 15 billion ringgit ($3.5 billion) of multicurrency financing to support its green data centers in Malaysia’s Johor state, according to a statement from Oversea-Chinese Banking Corporation Ltd.】

item.title: 中美修补关系，丙烷贸易出现复苏迹象
item.description: 随着中美两国寻求修补关系，中国塑料制造商正初步显示出恢复购买美国丙烷的迹象。【原文：Chinese plastics makers are showing tentative signs of reviving US propane purchases as the two economies seek to mend ties.】

item.title: 越航准备在巴黎航展上再订购约 100 架空客飞机
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，VietJet Aviation JSC 正在洽谈再订购约 100 架空中客车公司窄体喷气机，最早可能在下周的巴黎航展上宣布这笔交易。【原文：VietJet Aviation JSC is in talks to order about 100 additional Airbus SE narrowbody jets, according to people familiar with the matter, in a deal that could be announced as early as the Paris Air Show next week.】

item.title: 英格兰银行敦促贷款人加强使用回购机制
item.description: 随着银行资产负债表紧缩点的临近，英格兰银行已敦促贷款人加紧使用其常规流动性工具。【原文：The Bank of England has urged lenders to step up use of its routine liquidity facilities as a crunch point approaches for the bank’s balance sheet.】

item.title: 欧洲地区天气炎热，天然气价格上涨
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格扭转了连续三天的下滑趋势，因为欧洲大陆开始出现高于正常水平的气温，这可能会增加空调燃料的使用量。【原文：European natural gas prices reversed a three-day slide as above-normal temperatures started covering the continent, potentially driving up fuel use for air conditioning.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税政策仍在持续，柬埔寨对美出口大幅增长
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统承诺提高关税后，柬埔寨对美国的出口在前五个月与去年同期相比增长了27%。【原文：Cambodia’s exports to the US rose 27% through the first five months compared to the same period last year amid signs of front-loading following President Donald Trump’s pledge to raise tariffs.】

item.title: 花旗银行称中国出口受美国关税影响涌入东南亚市场
item.description: 根据花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Vietnam, Thailand and Indonesia are among Asian countries seeing the sharpest surge in Chinese imports as higher US tariffs upend regional trade, according to Citigroup Inc.】

item.title: 南非统计局局长为失业数据计算辩护
item.description: 南非统计机构负责人为该机构的失业数据方法进行了辩护，因为南非最大客户银行的负责人称，对交易员的错误分类意味着失业率要低得多。【原文：The head of South Africa’s statistics agency defended the methodology of his organization’s unemployment data after the chief of the nation’s top bank by customers said misclassification of traders means the jobless rate was much lower.】

item.title: 欧盟希望美国贸易谈判能超过特朗普的七月最后期限
item.description: 欧盟认为，与美国的贸易谈判可能会超过美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）规定的 7 月 9 日这一最后期限，尽管谈判的速度在过去一周有所加快。【原文：The European Union believes trade negotiations with the US could extend beyond President Donald Trump’s July 9 deadline, even as the speed of the talks has increased over the past week.】

item.title: 匈牙利通胀率再次上升，中央银行面临挑战
item.description: 匈牙利 5 月份通胀率三个月来首次加速上升，凸显出央行行长们在使消费价格增长回归目标方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Hungarian inflation accelerated in May for the first time in three months, underscoring central bankers’ challenge in returning consumer price growth toward their target.】

item.title: 瑞典对加入欧元的支持减弱，克朗走强
item.description: 一项调查显示，在近期克朗走强之后，瑞典人采用欧元的热情出现了四年半来的首次下降。【原文：Swedes’ enthusiasm to adopt the euro fell for the first time in four and a half years after a recent run of strength for the krona, a survey showed.】

item.title: 股票价格翻番，BSE 股票交易需谨慎
item.description: 在 BSE 股价大幅反弹之后，BSE 的股票受到了额外的审查，以提醒投资者并阻止任何投机性交易。【原文：BSE Ltd.’s shares have been placed under extra scrutiny to caution investors and deter any speculative trading, following a sharp rally in the bourse’s stock price.】

item.title: 中国稀土永磁制造商为出口美国开绿灯
item.description: 中国一家主要的稀土磁铁制造商获得了向包括美国在内的国家出口的许可，这可能是北京与华盛顿之间紧张局势缓和的一个迹象。【原文：A major Chinese manufacturer of rare-earth magnets received export permits to countries including the US, in a possible sign of easing tensions between Beijing and Washington.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市错失创纪录高点后将下滑
特使称欧盟已准备好第二次尝试澳大利亚贸易协议
item.description: 欧盟大使加布里埃莱-维森廷（Gabriele Visentin）表示，欧盟已经准备好并愿意第二次尝试与澳大利亚达成自由贸易协定，同时补充说，2023 年确定的达成协定的主要障碍基本未变。【原文：The European Union is ready and willing to make a second attempt at securing a free trade deal with Australia, EU Ambassador Gabriele Visentin said, while adding that the main obstacles to an accord that were identified in 2023 are largely unchanged.】

item.title: 据说保诚印度资产管理公司即将提交首次公开募股申请
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英国保诚集团（Prudential Plc）在印度的资产管理合资企业即将向当地监管机构提交首次公开募股的初步文件，募集资金可能高达 1,000 亿卢比（约合 12 亿美元）。【原文：Prudential Plc’s Indian asset-management venture is close to filing preliminary documents with the local regulator for a proposed initial public offering that may fetch as much as 100 billion rupees ($1.2 billion), according to people familiar with the matter.】
